title: Nutty Chocolate Cups with Yummi Nuts Omega Mix
ingredients: 1 bag of chopped Yummi Nuts Omega Mix
instructions: Step 1: Place the chocolate chips in a bowl over a pot of water and melt the chocolate in a double boiler.
Step 2: In a mini muffin tin fill halfway with chocolate. Cover with the crushed peanuts and finish with another layer of chocolate.
Step 3: Place in the refrigerator until hardened.
